casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Thomas Howard DUNCAN. No. 91A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 21, 2008. Lisa M. Miles, Attorney at Law, for Duncan. Rex Gore, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 656 S.E.2d 597.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of February 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of February 2008."
